00009 eolUint              _eol_model_max = 0;
00010 eolResourceManager * _eol_model_manager = NULL;

00016 void eol_model_init()
00017 {
00018   eol_logger_message(
00019       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00020       "eol_model:initializing\n");
00021   _eol_model_manager = eol_resource_manager_init(
00022     "eol_model_manager",
00023     _eol_model_max,
00024     sizeof(eolModel),
00025     eolFalse,
00026     eol_model_delete,
00027     eol_model_load_data_from_file
00028     );
00029 
00030   eol_logger_message(
00031       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00032       "eol_model:initialized\n");
00033   atexit(eol_model_close);
00034   _eol_model_initialized = eolTrue;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void eol_model_config()
00038 {
00039   _eol_model_max = 2048;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void eol_model_free(
00043     eolModel **model
00044   )
00045 {
00046   if (!eol_model_initialized())return;
00047   eol_resource_free_element(_eol_model_manager,(void **)model);
00048 }
00049 
00050 eolModel *eol_model_load(
00051     char *filename
00052   )
00053 {
00054   eolModel *model;
00055   if (!eol_model_initialized())
00056   {
00057     return NULL;
00058   }
00059   model =
00060     (eolModel *)eol_resource_manager_load_resource(_eol_model_manager,filename);
00061   return model;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void eol_model_delete(void *modelData)
00065 {
00066   eolModel *model;
00067   if (!modelData)return;
00068   model = (eolModel *)(modelData);
00069   if (model->_actionList != NULL)
00070   {
00071     free(model->_actionList);
00072     model->_actionList = NULL;
00073   }
00074   if (model->_mesh != NULL)
00075   {
00076     eol_mesh_free(&model->_mesh);
00077   }
00078   if (model->_skin != NULL)
00079   {
00080     eol_sprite_free(&model->_skin);
00081   }
00082   if (model->_sprite != NULL)
00083   {
00084     eol_sprite_free(&model->_sprite);
00085   }
00086   if (model->_arm != NULL)
00087   {
00088     eol_armature_free(&model->_arm);
00089   }
00090   memset(model,0,sizeof(eolModel));
00091 }
00092 
00093 void eol_model_clean()
00094 {
00095   if (!eol_model_initialized())
00096   {
00097     eol_logger_message(
00098         EOL_LOG_INFO,
00099         "eol_model:cannot clean, not initialized\n");
00100     return;
00101   }
00102   if (!_eol_model_manager)return;
00103   eol_resource_manager_clean(_eol_model_manager);
00104 }

00106 void eol_model_close()
00107 {
00108   eol_logger_message(
00109       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00110       "eol_model:closing\n");
00111   eol_resource_manager_free(&_eol_model_manager);
00112   _eol_model_max = 0;
00113   _eol_model_initialized = eolFalse;
00114   eol_logger_message(
00115       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00116       "eol_model:closed\n");
00117 }

00119 eolUint eol_model_load_action_count(eolFile *file)
00120 {
00121   eolUint count = 0;
00122   eolLine buf;
00123   if ((!file) || (!file->file))return 0;
00124   rewind(file->file);
00125   while(fscanf(file->file, "%s", buf) != EOF)
00126   {
00127     if(strcmp(buf,"action:") == 0)
00128     {
00129       count++;
00130       continue;
00131     }
00132   }
00133   return count;
00134 }

00136 eolBool eol_model_load_data_from_file(char * filename,void *data)
00137 {
00138   eolInt actionIndex = -1;
00139   eolUint actionCount = 0;
00140   eolWord tempWord;
00141   eolLine buf;
00142   eolFile *file;
00143   eolModel *model;
00144   eolInt temp;
00145   eolInt sw = -1,sh = -1;
00146   if (data == NULL)
00147     return eolFalse;
00148   
00149   file = eol_loader_read_file(filename);
00150   if (file == NULL)
00151     return eolFalse;
00152   
00153   model = (eolModel *)data;
00154   
00155   actionCount = eol_model_load_action_count(file);
00156   if (actionCount > 0)
00157   {
00158     model->_actionList = (eolAction *)malloc(sizeof(eolAction)*actionCount);
00159     if (model->_actionList == NULL)
00160     {
00161       eol_logger_message(
00162         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00163         "eol_model:unable to allocate action list for model\n");
00164         eol_loader_close_file(&file);
00165         return eolFalse;
00166     }
00167     memset(model->_actionList,0,sizeof(eolAction)*actionCount);
00168     model->numActions = actionCount;
00169   }
00170   
00171   rewind(file->file);
00172   actionIndex = -1;
00173   eol_vec3d_set(model->scale,1,1,1);
00174   while(fscanf(file->file, "%s", buf) != EOF)
00175   {
00176     if(strcmp(buf,"action:") == 0)
00177     {
00178       actionIndex++;
00179       if ((actionIndex >= model->numActions)||
00180           (actionIndex < 0))
00181       {
00182         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_model:over/under seeking in action list\n");
00183         continue;
00184       }
00185       fscanf(file->file, "%s",model->_actionList[actionIndex].name);
00186       continue;
00187     }
00188     if(strcmp(buf,"action_type:") == 0)
00189     {
00190       if ((actionIndex >= model->numActions)||
00191         (actionIndex < 0))
00192       {
00193         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_model:over/under seeking in action list\n");
00194         continue;
00195       }
00196       fscanf(file->file, "%s",tempWord);
00197       if (strncmp(tempWord,"loop",EOLWORDLEN) == 0)
00198       {
00199         model->_actionList[actionIndex].type = eolActionLoop;
00200       }
00201       if (strncmp(tempWord,"pass",EOLWORDLEN) == 0)
00202       {
00203         model->_actionList[actionIndex].type = eolActionPass;
00204       }
00205       if (strncmp(tempWord,"osci",EOLWORDLEN) == 0)
00206       {
00207         model->_actionList[actionIndex].type = eolActionOsci;
00208       }
00209       continue;
00210     }
00211     if(strcmp(buf,"action_framerate:") == 0)
00212     {
00213       if ((actionIndex >= model->numActions)||
00214         (actionIndex < 0))
00215       {
00216         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_model:over/under seeking in action list\n");
00217         continue;
00218       }
00219       fscanf(file->file, "%f",&model->_actionList[actionIndex].frameRate);
00220       continue;
00221     }
00222     if(strcmp(buf,"action_begin:") == 0)
00223     {
00224       if ((actionIndex >= model->numActions)||
00225         (actionIndex < 0))
00226       {
00227         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_model:over/under seeking in action list\n");
00228         continue;
00229       }
00230       fscanf(file->file, "%ui",&model->_actionList[actionIndex].begin);
00231       continue;
00232     }
00233     if(strcmp(buf,"action_end:") == 0)
00234     {
00235       if ((actionIndex >= model->numActions)||
00236         (actionIndex < 0))
00237       {
00238         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_ERROR,"eol_model:over/under seeking in action list\n");
00239         continue;
00240       }
00241       fscanf(file->file, "%ui",&model->_actionList[actionIndex].end);
00242       continue;
00243     }
00244     if(strcmp(buf,"model:") == 0)
00245     {
00246       fscanf(file->file, "%s",model->name);
00247       continue;
00248     }
00249     if(strcmp(buf,"mesh:") == 0)
00250     {
00251       fscanf(file->file, "%s",model->_meshFile);
00252       continue;
00253     }
00254     if(strcmp(buf,"skin:") == 0)
00255     {
00256       fscanf(file->file, "%s",model->_skinFile);
00257       continue;
00258     }
00259     if(strcmp(buf,"scale:") == 0)
00260     {
00261       fscanf(file->file, "%lf,%lf,%lf",&model->scale.x,&model->scale.y,&model->scale.z);
00262       continue;
00263     }
00264     if(strcmp(buf,"offset:") == 0)
00265     {
00266       fscanf(file->file, "%lf,%lf,%lf",&model->offset.x,&model->offset.y,&model->offset.z);
00267       continue;
00268     }
00269     if(strcmp(buf,"rotation:") == 0)
00270     {
00271       fscanf(file->file, "%lf,%lf,%lf",&model->rotation.x,&model->rotation.y,&model->rotation.z);
00272       continue;
00273     }
00274     if(strcmp(buf,"arm:") == 0)
00275     {
00276       fscanf(file->file, "%s",model->_armFile);
00277       continue;
00278     }
00279     if(strcmp(buf,"sprite:") == 0)
00280     {
00281       fscanf(file->file, "%s",model->_spriteFile);
00282       continue;
00283     }
00284     if(strcmp(buf,"spritecellsize:") == 0)
00285     {
00286       fscanf(file->file, "%i %i",&sw,&sh);
00287       continue;
00288     }
00289     if(strcmp(buf,"sprite_is_3D") == 0)
00290     {
00291       fscanf(file->file, "%i",&temp);
00292       if (temp != eolFalse)
00293       {
00294         model->_sprite_3D = eolTrue;
00295       }
00296       else
00297       {
00298         model->_sprite_3D = eolFalse;
00299       }
00300       continue;
00301     }
00302   }
00303   eol_loader_close_file(&file);
00304   if (strlen(model->_spriteFile) > 0)
00305   {
00306     model->_sprite = eol_sprite_load(model->_spriteFile,sw,sh);
00307   }
00308   if (strlen(model->_skinFile) > 0)
00309   {
00310     model->_skin = eol_sprite_load(model->_skinFile,-1,-1);
00311   }
00312   if (strlen(model->_meshFile) > 0)
00313   {
00314     model->_mesh = eol_mesh_load(model->_meshFile);
00315   }
00316   if (strlen(model->_armFile) > 0)
00317   {
00318     model->_arm = eol_armature_load(model->_armFile);
00319     if (model->_mesh != NULL)
00320     {
00321       eol_armature_link_mesh(model->_arm,model->_mesh);
00322     }
00323   }
00324   return eolTrue;
00325 }
00326 
00327 eolAction * eol_model_get_action(
00328     eolModel *model,
00329     eolWord   aName
00330   )
00331 {
00332   int i;
00333   if (!model)return NULL;
00334   if (!eol_model_initialized())return NULL;
00335   for (i = 0; i < model->numActions;i++)
00336   {
00337     if (strncmp(model->_actionList[i].name,aName,EOLWORDLEN) == 0)
00338     {
00339       return &model->_actionList[i];
00340     }
00341   }
00342   return NULL;
00343 }
00344 
00345 eolBool eol_model_initialized()
00346 {
00347   return _eol_model_initialized;
00348 }
00349 
00350 void eol_model_draw(
00351     eolModel *model,
00352     eolVec3D position,
00353     eolVec3D rotation,
00354     eolVec3D scale,
00355     eolVec3D color,
00356     eolFloat alpha,
00357     eolUint  frame
00358   )
00359 {
00360   if (!model)return;
00361   if (alpha == 0)
00362   {
00363     /*cannot draw a clear model, so don't waste the math*/
00364     return;
00365   }
00366   scale.x *= model->scale.x;
00367   scale.y *= model->scale.y;
00368   scale.z *= model->scale.z;
00369   eol_vec3d_add(position,model->offset,position);
00370   eol_vec3d_add(rotation,model->rotation,rotation);
00371   if ((scale.x == 0) &&
00372       (scale.y == 0) &&
00373       (scale.z == 0))
00374   {
00375     /*cannot draw a zero scaled model*/
00376     return;
00377   }
00378   /*TODO: check to see if the model is on camera...*/
00379   if (model->_mesh != NULL)
00380   {
00381     if (model->_arm != NULL)
00382     {
00383       eol_armature_deform_mesh(model->_arm, model->_mesh,frame);
00384     }
00385     eol_mesh_draw(
00386         model->_mesh,
00387         position,
00388         rotation,
00389         scale,
00390         color,
00391         alpha,
00392         model->_skin
00393       );
00394   }
00395   if (model->_sprite != NULL)
00396   {
00397     if (model->_sprite_3D)
00398     {
00399       eol_sprite_draw_transformed_3d(
00400         model->_sprite,
00401         frame,
00402         position,
00403         scale,
00404         rotation,
00405         color,
00406         alpha
00407       );
00408     }
00409     else
00410     {
00411       eol_sprite_draw_transformed(
00412         model->_sprite,
00413         frame,
00414         position.x,
00415         position.y,
00416         scale.x,
00417         scale.y,
00418         rotation.z,
00419         eolFalse,
00420         eolFalse,
00421         color,
00422         alpha
00423       );
00424     }
00425   }
00426 }
00427

00429     eolModel *model,
00430     eolVec3D position,
00431     eolVec3D rotation,
00432     eolVec3D scale,
00433     eolVec3D color,
00434     eolFloat alpha,
00435     eolUint  frame
00436   )

00440   {

00442     return;

00445   scale.y *= model->scale.y;

00448   eol_vec3d_add(rotation,model->rotation,rotation);

00450       (scale.y == 0) &&

00454     return;

00462     }

00464         model->_mesh,
00465         position,
00466         rotation,
00467         scale,
00468         color,
00469         alpha
00470       );

00477         model->_sprite,

00480         scale,
00481         rotation,
00482         color,

00489         model->_sprite,

00491         position.x,
00492         position.y,

00496         eolFalse,
00497         eolFalse,

00499         alpha
00500       );
